description1: I managed advertising campaigns across Google Ads and Bing Ads platforms, which also involved collaborating with clients' web development teams to optimize on-site SEO and tracking elements, and the user experience of landings pages and webforms across various platforms.
description2: In my capacity as Senior IT Manager also oversaw critical IT systems and providing support to users across the organisation. I also developed custom Google Apps Scripts for Google Sheets for use in teams across the organisation, automating tasks and simplifying processes.

description1: During my tenure in this role I managed PPC campaigns across Google Ads, Bing Ads and Facebook Ads platforms and was responsible for overseeing a number of critical IT systems, providing first and second-line IT support to users across the organisation.
description2: Responsibilities included the creation of effective PPC landing pages and the implementation of necessary conversion tracking and affiliate tracking systems. I also played a key role in introducing Agile practices to the organization, including training teams and implementing processes such as Kanban boards, daily stand-ups, and sprints to enhance business operations.

description1: My role focused on supporting the account manager team internally. I conducted SEO backlink analysis and on-site reviews for our clients, working alongside the account manager team to devise effective SEO strategies. I also played a key role in resolving Google SEO penalties through link disavow submissions. My responsibilities were expanded after a year to include the management of Google Ads and Bing Ads accounts.

This three-year undergraduate course centred on game design and programming, providing a comprehensive range of skills. Subjects covered include: game engines and physics, rapid prototyping, design documentation, networking with LANs and WANs, and game production and testing.

designation: BTEC National Diploma for IT Practitioners
description1: My national diploma encompassed a wide spectrum of IT disciplines, I gained comprehensive knowledge in software development, database management systems, website management and development, computer hardware, computer systems analysis and design, and computational methods.
